name: The Dreamlands: Aisling's Quest
description: Help Aisling free The Dreamlands from The Mourner! The Dreamlands: Aisling's Quest is an adventure game that blends fantasy and mystery elements to present a gripping story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Dual core CPU @2GHz Memory: 512 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video memory Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Dual core CPU @2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device Additional Notes: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent for 4K gameplay
